context: Redfin expanded into iBuying with RedfinNow, representing 25%+ of 2020 revenue. Hot housing market during pandemic. Competed with Opendoor and Zillow Offers in instant buying space.

competitors.name: Zillow
competitors.notes: Zillow Offers iBuying, dominant real estate portal

competitors.name: Opendoor
competitors.notes: iBuying market leader, 9,193 homes sold in 2020
